title: "Forging a Metal Afro Pick" - with Ify Nwadiwe
itunes:title: "Forging a Metal Afro Pick" - with Ify Nwadiwe
description:
In today's episode, Jasper & Jeremy sit down with the one and only Ify Nwadiwe. Talking about some of Ify's most iconic characters from D20 to Critical Role, heavy role-playing with B Dave Walters on G4 & the erasure of people of colour throughout history... And the all-black improv team called 'The White Women'?

Want more 3BH in your life?
You can now buy merchandise here! 

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including kickbacks where we hang out with some of our favourite people and previous guests of the show and discuss... well anything we feel like! 

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @3blackhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
